summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 CHRYSLER TOWN AND COUNTRY. THE CONTACT STATED THE ELECTRONIC LOCKING SYSTEM FAILED TO WORK ON ALL OF THE DOORS INCLUDING THE REAR SLIDING DOOR. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 75,000  AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 90,000.
